snippet: A spam account on Twitter that tries to get people to buy electronic books about horses has spawned a following online among people amused by its nonsensical ramblings.
abstract: A spam account on Twitter that tries to get people to buy electronic books about horses has spawned a following online among people amused by its nonsensical ramblings.
lead_paragraph: Spam "bots" tend to be a source of annoyance, flooding the Web with automated nonsensical messages in the hopes of tricking people into clicking on links.

headline.main: Web Comic Draws Inspiration From a Twitter Spammer
